attributes.action: DISBAND THE USELESS PRO POLCE IPCC
attributes.additional_details:
TH IPCC WAS SET UP AS A SO CALLED INDEPENDANT POLICE COMPLAINTS AUTORITY.
BUT USES SERVING POLICE OFFICERS TO INVESTIGATE COMPLAINTS.. (YES  THATS RIGHT THE POLICE IVESTIGATE  THEM SELVES)..
THE POLICE CAN SHOOT DEAD INNOCENT PEOPLE ( JEAN CHARLES DEMENZIES LONDON TUBE TRAIN).. THAY CAN SHOOT, TAZER, MAIM,AND BEAT UP MEMBERS OF THE PUBLIC WITHOUT EVER BEING HELD TO ACCOUNT BECAUSE THE PRO POLICE IPCC ALWAYS  SIDE WITH THE POLICE. WE NEED  ALL COMPLAINTS MADE AGAINTS THE POLICE INVESTIGATED BY TOTALLY INDEPENDANT PEOPLE WHO HAVE NO LINKS WITH THE POLICE WHAT SO EVER AND THEN THERE WILL BE NO MORE WHITE WASHSES CAVER UP,S AND CONSPIRICEYS!!
